Verses: 1 karththar Aabiraamai Nokki: Nee Un Dhesaththaiyum, Un Inaththaiyum, Un Thagappanudaiya Veettaiyum Vittup Purappattu, Naan Unakkuk Kaanbikkum Dhesaththukkup Po.
2 naan Unnaip Periya Jaadhiyaakki, Unnai Aaseervadhiththu, Un Peraip Perumaippaduththuven; Nee Aaseervaadhamaai Iruppaai.
3 unnai Aaseervadhikkiravargalai Aaseervadhippen, Unnai Sabikkiravanai Sabippen; Boomiyilulla Vamsangalellaam Unakkul Aaseervadhikkappadum Endraar.
4 karththar Aabiraamukku Sonnapadiye Avan Purappattup Ponaan; Loththum Avanodekoodap Ponaan. Aabiraam Aaraanaivittup Purappattapodhu, Ezhubaththaindhu Vayadhullavanaayirundhaan.

5 aabiraam Than Manaiviyaagiya Saaraayaiyum, Than Sagodharanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Loththaiyum, Thaangal Sambaadhiththirundha Thangal Sambaththellaavatraiyum, Aaraanile Savadhariththa Janangalaiyum Koottikkondu, Avargal Kaanaan Dhesaththukkup Purappattuppoi, Kaanaan Dhesaththile Serndhaargal.
6 aabiraam Andha Dhesaththil Sutrith Thirindhu Seekem Ennum Idaththukku Sameebamaana More Ennum Samaboomimattum Vandhaan; Akkaalaththile Kaanaaniyar Aththesaththil Irundhaargal.
7 karththar Aabiraamukkuth Dharisanamaagi: Un Sandhadhikku Indha Dhesaththaik Koduppen Endraar. Appozhudhu Avan Thanakku Dharisanamaana Karththarukku Ange Oru Balipeedaththaik Kattinaan.

8 pinbu Avan Avvidamvittup Peyarndhu, Beththelukkuk Kizhakke Irukkum Malaikkup Poi, Beththel Thanakku Merkaagavum Aayee Kizhakkaagavum Irukkak Koodaaram Pottu, Ange Karththarukku Oru Balipeedaththaik Katti, Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukondaan.
9 adhinpin Aabiraam Purappattu, Therke Prayaanampannikkondu Ponaan.
10 aththesaththile Panjam Undaayitru; Dhesaththile Panjam Kodidhaayirundhapadiyaal, Aabiraam Egipthu Dhesaththile Thangumpadi Avvidaththukkup Ponaan.
11 avan Egipthukku Sameebamaai Vandhapodhu, Than Manaivi Saaraayaip Paarththu: Nee Paarvaikku Azhagulla Sthree Endru Ariven.
12 egipthiyar Unnaik Kaanumpodhu, Ival Avanudaiya Manaivi Endru Solli, Ennaik Kondrupottu, Unnai Uyirode Vaippaargal.
13 aagaiyaal, Unnimiththam Enakku Nanmai Undaagumpadikkum, Unnaale En Uyir Pizhaikkumpadikkum, Nee Unnai En Sagodhari Endru Sol Endraan.
14 aabiraam Egipthile Vandhapodhu, Egipthiyar Andha Sthreeyai Migundha Azhagullavalendru Kandaargal.
15 paarvonudaiya Prabukkalum Avalaik Kandu, Paarvonukku Munbaaga Avalaip Pugazhndhaargal. Appozhudhu Andha Sthree Paarvonudaiya Aramanaikkuk Kondupogappattaal.
16 aval Nimiththam Avan Aabiraamukku Dhayaipaaraattinaan; Avanukku Aadumaadugalum, Kazhudhaigalum, Velaikkaararum, Velaikkaarigalum, Koligaik Kazhudhaigalum, Ottagangalum Kidaiththadhu.
17 aabiraamudaiya Manaiviyaagiya Saaraayin Nimiththam Karththar Paarvonaiyum, Avan Veettaaraiyum Magaa Vaadhaigalaal Vaadhiththaar.
18 appozhudhu Paarvon Aabiraamai Azhaiththu: Nee Enakku En Ippadi Seydhaai? Ival Un Manaivi Endru Nee Enakku Ariviyaamar Ponadhenna?
19 ivalai Un Sagodhari Endru Nee Sollavenduvadhu Enna? Ivalai Naan Enakku Manaiviyaagakkondiruppene; Idho Un Manaivi; Ivalai Azhaiththukkondupo Endru Sonnaan.
20 paarvon Avanaikkuriththuth Than Manusharukkuk Kattalai Koduththaan; Avargal Avanaiyum, Avan Manaiviyaiyum Avanukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Anuppivittaargal.
